results.title: [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization].
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were divided into @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group and control group according to whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was used or not, and the incidence rates of @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@deep vein thrombosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@), @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@pulmonary thromboembolism@@@ (@DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@PTE@@@) and @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ events were compared between @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group and the control group, and multifactorial logistic regression model was used to analyze the association between the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and risk of @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@, @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@PTE@@@, @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006471 @@@gastrointestinal hemorrhage@@@, and @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ from other parts of the body.

citations.NLM: Huang WY, Yan XY, Chen YR. [Effect of metformin on the incidence of venous thromboembolism in medical inpatients during hospitalization]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2025 Sep 23;105(36):3208-3213. PMID: 41017352

results.title: Analysis of factors related to venous thrombosis after ankle fracture combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus applying tourniquet surgery.
results.text_hl: The objective was to study the risk factors of @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@venous thrombosis@@@ after @DISEASE_Ankle_Fractures @DISEASE_MESH:D064386 @@@ankle fracture@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ surgery using a tourniquet and to assess the effect of ischemic preconditioning and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination therapy in preventing @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang CG. Analysis of factors related to venous thrombosis after ankle fracture combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus applying tourniquet surgery. Medicine (Baltimore). 2024 Nov 22;103(47):e40296. PMID: 39809164

results.title: Association of Metformin Use With Risk of Venous Thromboembolism in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes: A General-Population-Based Cohort Study.
results.text_hl: The corresponding risks for @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Embolism @DISEASE_MESH:D011655 @@@pulmonary embolism@@@ (adjusted HR = 0.71, 95% CI: 0.50, 1.01) and @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@deep vein thrombosis@@@ (adjusted HR = 0.64, 95% CI: 0.48, 0.87) were also lower in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ initiators than in @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ initiators.

citations.NLM: Sha T, Zhang Y, Li C, Lei G, Wu J, Li X, Yang Z, Zeng C, Wei J. Association of Metformin Use With Risk of Venous Thromboembolism in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes: A General-Population-Based Cohort Study. Am J Epidemiol. 2022 Mar 24;191(5):856-866. PMID: 34999759

results.title: Metformin use in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus is associated with reduced risk of deep vein thrombosis: a non-randomized, pair-matched cohort study
results.text_hl: Cox proportional hazards models were used to test the association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use with @<m>DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@.
